description:
They say that the space-time distortions in a warp zone can cause those with particularly keen senses to see visions. What hallucinations will Subaru experience during his first warp with Romeo, the ship`s newest pilot?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: THE NEW RECORD(S) / GHOST IN THE COCKPIT
